name: Pirate Bounty
description:
Pirate Bounty! is a game made for KenneyJam2021.

It was made by one developer in about a day and a half.

You can check out the full project here: https://github.com/saix93/PirateBounty

W - Accelerate

A & D - Rotate ship and reload that side cannon

S - Decelerate

Mouse - Aim

Left click - Shoot

Have fun!
